# busccR

[![Lifecycle:
experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/cfox20/busccR/actions/workflows/rcmd.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/cfox20/busccR/actions/workflows/rcmd.yaml)
[![License:
MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

Welcome to the **Baylor Statistical Science Consulting Center (BUSCC)**.

The BUSCC supports researchers, students, and faculty across Baylor
University by providing high-quality statistical consulting,
methodological guidance, and data-driven collaboration. As a consultant,
you play an essential role in helping clients translate research
questions into rigorous, reproducible analyses.

The **busccR** package was developed to support consulting workflows
within the center by providing tools, templates, and tracking for
consulting projects.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Purpose of this Package

The goal of **busccR** is to help BUSCC consultants:

- Maintain consistent consulting practices across projects  
- Access reusable functions and utilities for analysis and reporting  
- Improve efficiency in client-facing deliverables  
- Improve project workflow and track project status

This package is intended for internal use by BUSCC consultants and
trainees.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Getting Started

If you are new to the package, check out the reference
[website](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/index.html). The best place to
begin is the [**Getting
Started**](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/articles/getting_started.html)
guide.

Please read the introductory article here:

**Articles â†’ Getting Started**

# Package index

## Core functions

- [`build_registry()`](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/reference/build_registry.md)
  : Build a CSV registry of all consulting projects (base R only)
- [`complete_project()`](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/reference/complete_project.md)
  : Complete a consulting project record
- [`create_presentation()`](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/reference/create_presentation.md)
  : Create a new presentation
- [`create_project()`](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/reference/create_project.md)
  : Create a new consulting project
- [`create_report()`](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/reference/create_report.md)
  : Create a new report
- [`get_box_root()`](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/reference/get_box_root.md)
  : Get the configured Box root folder
- [`set_box_root()`](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/reference/set_box_root.md)
  : Set the Box root folder for the Statistical Consulting Center
- [`update_project()`](https://cfox20.github.io/busccR/reference/update_project.md)
  : Update an existing consulting project record
